thread.title: Miranda Kerr plays dutiful girlfriend
thread.title_full: Miranda Kerr plays dutiful girlfriend - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Miranda Kerr plays dutiful girlfriend
text:
Australian model Miranda Kerr made a rather quiet visit to Bengaluru recently, when she accompanied current beau, Snapchat CEO Evan Spiegel, to the Economic Times Startup Awards in the city.
The former partner of actor Orlando Bloom , with whom she has a son, insisted on privacy during the event, allowing photographers to click her pictures only during Evan's session. She was seen interacting with Isha Ambani and left the venue before Evan's session ended.
